previous.title: What Should My Image Look Like?

contents.content:
Now it’s your turn to answer a scientific question by creating a representative color image and explaining what it reveals.

  • Look through a dusty nebula to see what’s inside
  • Search for a faraway galaxy
  • Locate the hot young stars in a galaxy
  • Identify star-forming regions in a galaxy

Think about these points before you begin:

  • What would you like to investigate?
  • What question do you want to answer?
  • What filters will be most appropriate for conducting your investigation? Why? (You need at least two filters, but you don’t have to use all six.)
  • What colors do you want to use for your chromatic ordering sequence and which color will you assign to each filter?
